song.englishname: I'll Show You How To Live

english.segment1: I heard the sound of your first breath. A brand new life on your mothers chest. A beating heart, expectant eyes. On the first day of your life. I saw you take your first step. And I watched you run with no regret. To chase your dreams and find true love. And the best is yet to come
english.segment2: So come with Me. Ill show you life. Even better than this. Come with Me. Ill show you love. You didnt know could exist. Better than your first crush. Better than your first kiss. Ill show you how to live
english.segment3: Remember how you felt from across the room. When you realized someone had eyes for you. And the way your heart sang cuz you believed. You were worth something
english.segment4: So come with me. Ill show you life. Even better than this. Come with me. Ill show you love. You didnt know could exist. Better than your first crush. Better than your first kiss. Ill show you how to live. Oh, Ill show you how to live
english.segment5: Cuz I created your heart. That makes you feel. I am the love that makes it real. Oh, I am the One, Im the One, Im the One. I am the One, Im the One, Im the One
english.segment6: So come with Me. Ill show you life. Even better than this. Come with Me. Ill show you love. You didnt know could exist. Better than your first crush. Better than your first kiss. Ill show you how to live
english.segment7: Cause I am the One, Im the One, Im the One. I am the one, Im the One, Im the One
